scripts.wipe-dev-db: npx wrangler d1 execute DB --env development --command="DELETE FROM verses; DELETE FROM sessions; DELETE FROM magic_links; DELETE FROM users;"
scripts.reinit-dev-db: npx wrangler d1 execute DB --env development --file=./schema.sql
scripts.dev:stats: npx wrangler d1 execute DB --env development --command="SELECT * FROM user_stats WHERE user_id = 1;"
scripts.db:prod: npx wrangler d1 execute DB --env production --remote
scripts.db:prod:users: npx wrangler d1 execute DB --env production --remote --command="SELECT * FROM users;"
scripts.db:dev:users: npx wrangler d1 execute DB --env development --command="SELECT * FROM users;"
scripts.db:prod:verses: npx wrangler d1 execute DB --env production --remote --command="SELECT * FROM verses;"
scripts.db:dev:verses: npx wrangler d1 execute DB --env development --command="SELECT * FROM verses;"
scripts.db:prod:sessions: npx wrangler d1 execute DB --env production --remote --command="SELECT * FROM sessions;"
scripts.db:dev:sessions: npx wrangler d1 execute DB --env development --command="SELECT * FROM sessions;"
scripts.db:prod:magic-links: npx wrangler d1 execute DB --env production --remote --command="SELECT * FROM magic_links;"
scripts.db:dev:magic-links: npx wrangler d1 execute DB --env development --command="SELECT * FROM magic_links;"
